In England, in the seven days to 05 August, there were 50,414 new confirmed cases (89.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 July, there were 66,087 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (15,673 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 August is 19,745,612 (34,917 cases per 100,000 population).
